page.title: 11MOUNTSORREL GROWTH
page.content: |=============================| |Year Population | |====|=====|==================| |1377| 150| | |1825| 1400| ** | |1863| 1700| *** | |1871| 2000| **** | |1901| 2450| **** | |1931| 2900| ***** | |1959| 4000| ******** | |1967| 4300| ******** | |1985| 6050| ************ | |====|=====|==================| Mountsorrel village extends outside the grid reference.Many amenities have ,therefore, not been counted.They include the following 5 shops,2 pubs,a transport cafe,a nursery,a service station. There are plans to build a by-pass for the congested A6. Controversy over routes-now to be through the flood-plain-cost Â£13+m.
